CustomField.description: This field contains the url of the contact's picture. It will be used in a flow to display the image of the contact on the lighting record page
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Insert here the url of the contact's image. In order to copy an image from LinkedIn, first click on the contact's picture so it pops up, then right mouse click on "Copy Image Address" and paste this url into this field.
CustomField.label: Picture URL
